website_summaries.verdict: A good option for younger aspiring timbale players or as an additional drum.
pros: Small 10" diameter creates a higher pitch percussive sound that stands out from a normal timbale set
Smaller profile is easier to handle for younger students
A great addition to any drum kit
cons: Drum head lacks any type of included mounting hardware or stand

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add a 10" piccolo tom to my kit. I was ready to purchase one made by DW at more than twice the price of this mini timbale. So I came across this little gem on Amazon. At less than 50 bucks, I thought it was too good to be true. Man, I couldn't have been more wrong. This thing is made out of good quality materials with an excellent fit and finish. I replaced the original head with another I had laying around. And I could not be more pleased. Now I'm considering an 8" to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: You’re going to like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to your set without spending a lot of dinero.... Nice look Nicely made by PACIFIC/DW 10 inch perfect size AWESOME sound... Adds a lot to your sound... Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Crazily well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: PDP really makes some amazing quality drums for the money. I was so impressed with this little drum, I'd consider buying a full kit of theirs one day. This little 4x10 drum is absolutely real steel because it weighs a ton for being so small. The sound is excellent, and really works great as an add-on tom.
customer_reviews.author: JuRo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many timbales. Also some snares hybrid style. I play reggae and like.to have a timbale to the left of my hihat for quick fills. This is the first time i tried a clamp on style because i didn't have room in my current set up for another snare stand with timbale. I expected it to be ok. It is actually amazing! I cranked it up super high and can just pop it anytime. Its my favorite part of my new.drumset. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Jahred Namaste

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds pretty good, I was surprised. It has an authentic timbale sound except a bit higher pitched because it is 10" diameter as opposed to 14" or so for a normal timbale. For $50 I wasn't expecting a whole lot but I was pleasantly surprised. This is a great addition to any drum kit. The head might be a little on the cheap side and can be dented more easily than most, but even so I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Norenthalda

customer_reviews.title: Great add on drum
customer_reviews.text: Good tom tom sound. Easy to mount to cymbal stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer gary

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal. Nice tight punch. A great add on to any drum kit!
customer_reviews.author: Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Received product in excellent condition at my doorstep in an extremely timely manner
customer_reviews.text: Received product in excellent condition at my doorstep in an extremely timely manner. They were everything I expected and then some. Mounted on drum kit within minutes of opening package. Very easy to tune and was up and running in no time at all. Less then 5 minutes. Nice product very pleased. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schooley

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an excellent add-on for versatility; well made, and sounds great. use the Gibraltar SC-LRAC L-Rod Adjust Clamp 9.5Mm for an easy addition to your kit with an awesome timbale sound Well worth the purchase price
customer_reviews.author: RegularJoe

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Drums by DW Mini Timbale, Chrome Plated Steel, 4X10
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have some Latin flavour on my drums and this Timbale has been a pleasing addition to my Mapex drum kit. It sets up comfortably with the rest of the kit and gives that Latin flavour to it. In my opinion it is fairly priced, very good quality and looks. You can have a look and its sounds at [...] under MrLatinDrums. Thanks for Amazon to keep Global Trade alive and kicking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for an affordable
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for an affordable, auxiliary piece, although not quite the same as a real timbale. Great for a drummer on a budget, especially when used mainly for accents in reggae, rock, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised and a great sound for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Drummer
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift to my son-in-law who plays in a band. He said it complemented his other druns and is very satisfied with the sound
customer_reviews.author: teddy

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Drums by DW Mini Timbale, Chrome Plated Steel, 4X10
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my set up very well made for the price. Comfortably fits in a limited spot on my rig and gives off that Timbale sound that adds flavor to it. Got to my house quicker than expected. Thanks Amozon. George Materia Rustika Orlando Florida
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: it is an excellent addition to our drum set for some of the different rithyms we play with our band
customer_reviews.author: Jose alfredo jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These mini timbals are very good, adapt easily to my set of drums and have good sound
customer_reviews.author: renriqueh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy to tune. Mounting bracket was too small for my tom tom rack.
customer_reviews.author: BigIsl.Trading808

customer_reviews.title: sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: This Tom came in a very short time and in very good condition for what I paid. With some tuning it sounds awesome. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan flanker

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding little bale. My only complaint is that the mount doesn't fit DW, Yamaha sized Tom mounts. You need to put it on a cymbal stand. Otherwise, great drum, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, seems to be made with good quality. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Monny

customer_reviews.title: Sounds beautiful, great price, holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: I use it instead of a top rack tom. It adds a special quality of bright singing tone, and clear attack, that really spices up my sound. It's a great investment and the price is very reasonable. It holds up well to extended beatings.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart W.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my traps
customer_reviews.text: This mini timbale really is the focal point of the trap set of my kit. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Timbale taste
customer_reviews.text: The Pacific Mini Timbale adds a taste of latin to the drum set in a limited space. It mounts easily and its 10 inch diameter produces the sound that adds a salsa feel. You get the Latin flavor rim shot and open tone that will give your beat an authentic feel at a great Amazon price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Drum

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Drum kit
customer_reviews.text: I have this attached to my hi hat stand with a pdp clamp its so great adds versatility to my kit. looking into buying the 8 inch
customer_reviews.author: DrumLover2013

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with that distinctive timbale sound! Very nice addition to my set up! It has the DW quality at reasonable investment
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Keesee

customer_reviews.title: Little Add-On, Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add some high-end to my toms (I play a PDP 805 kit), and this mini-timbale is the perfect add-on! Great sound for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rich1380

customer_reviews.title: Great Timbale by PDP
customer_reviews.text: Really stellar deal on this timbale. Sounds awesome! I have to say that at half the price I definitely have a great addition to my drum kit!
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Solid, at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little timbale for my parade set up. The best price, compared to similiar offerings from other brands. Sturdy shell construct. Timely delivery All good! 😎🎶
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Honest seller and great product for the price. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: mel wilson

customer_reviews.title: Roots Rock Reggae!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to dangerously tighten the skin to get the roots reggae sound I wanted, but I got it. Customized a bracket for it to hang on my electric drum set...wonderful addition! Jag Bless!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Tom-bale
customer_reviews.text: Great attack and nice tone out of a "cheap" drum. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Savage Henry

product_meta.title: Pacific Drums by DW Mini Timbale, Chrome Plated Steel, 4X10
product_meta.description: Pacific Drums by DW Mini Timbale(Chrome 10 Inches)
feature_bullets: Perfect for incorporating into a drum set, the PDP Mini Timbale provides authentic Latin percussion in a compact configuration.
